snippet: The Carnival Corporation, in response to a question about whether it would pay back funds in the rescue of a ship, did not directly refer to any reimbursement.
abstract: Carnival Corporation, responding to question about whether it will pay back funds in rescue of its Triumph cruise ship, says that all maritime interests must assist without question those in trouble at sea, and makes no direct reference to reimbursement.
lead_paragraph: The Carnival Corporation, in response to a question about whether it would pay back funds in the rescue of a ship, did not directly refer to any reimbursement.

headline.main: Florida: Cruise Line Is Pressed on Paying for Rescue
headline.print_headline: Florida: Cruise Line Is Pressed On Paying For Rescue
